None.Name: Frost Spear
None.Description: Every 2.6 seconds, unit throws her spear at enemies dealing 75 damage.

None.Name: Gifted Gravity Surge
None.Description: Activate to impale a flying enemy unit and pull it down to the ground. The caught flier will then be enchained to the ground for 10 seconds and can no longer move. Ground units will be able to attack it while it is bound. Reusable every 20 seconds.
